dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Discover e m Learning Implementing an eLearning project takes resources human capacity planning and time The session describes the e mLearning journey and the steps concepts and tools along the way These steps include assessment requirements analysis and specifications content technology tools tracking learning professional development and M E Join this panel of presenters from Jhpiego hear about specific approaches that have been applied in Ghana Ethiopia and Zambia to improve and update skills of health workers You ll learn about some of the digital tools today for effective distance learning Presented by George Muyunda Strategic Information Technical Advisor JhpiegoJodi Lis ICT4D Advisor JhpiegoLeonard Maximus Ireneous Mensah ICT4D Officer JhpiegoMeaza Raya Education and Training Officer Jhpiego Ethiopia
A Journey into eLearning in Ethiopia, Ghana, and Zambia
